message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $140?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $137.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to go down to $138, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $132?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I really want to make a sale, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to go down to $139, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
